title: SkySentiment: SEA Airline Review Insights
description: A Python-based program with a Power BI dashboard that provides insights into customer satisfaction with the top 10 Southeast Asian (SEA) airlines using sentiment analysis of SkyTrax reviews. It analyzes review data to gauge public sentiment and presents the results through clear visual reports. The insights can help you decide which airline to book for your next trip, ensuring a better travel experience.

title: TMGMON: Early Detection and Monitoring Dashboard
description: A React.js and Spring Boot-based dashboard to replace manual email notifications for early detection and monitoring. This new solution enhances scalability, performance, and process efficiency, enabling more effective alarm and alert management.

title: My Azure Portfolio
description: An Azure Portfolio/Resume inspired by an ACG project, showcasing my skills in web development and cloud engineering. Built with React.js for the frontend, Azure Functions for the backend, and hosted on Microsoft Azure.

title: Sew-Cut: A Mobile Tailoring Management System with a Body Measurement Tool for Balalaâ€™s Dressmaking and Tailoring Shop
description: Published in the Journal of Global Business Online Journal (ISSN: 2350-7179) last August 2023. Sew-Cut is a mobile tailoring management system developed for Balala's Tailoring Shop. It automates manual processes, streamlining order tracking and customer measurement recording. The system incorporates 2D measurement guidance with animation and speech for customer ease, assisting in online order measurements.

title: Air Quality Index and Air Pollutant Concentration Prediction Based on Machine Learning Algorithms
description: This project aims to determine the optimal machine learning model for predicting air quality index (AQI) and air pollutant concentrations. It also focuses on using time series forecasting techniques to analyze how AQI can change over time. Additionally, the project involves the creation and implementation of a web application to test the predictive model and a recommender algorithm for suggesting air quality improvement strategies.

title: Cordillera Administrative Region Forest 2030: Predictive Modeling of Future Forest Cover Change Patterns
description: This project aims to analyze future forest cover change patterns in the Cordillera Administrative Region (CAR) using machine learning algorithms. The SARIMAX model (Time Series Forecasting) predicts an increase in tree cover loss of up to 7.387 kha by 2030, highlighting the importance of raising public awareness about the region's forest condition.

title: Project Phoenix Unified Portal UI
description: This is a user interface design for Project Phoenix's unified portal, serving as a one-stop-shop for ID lifecycle management, TAP tool access, B2B Access Packages, and others.
